channel.title: Help plz
channel.description: Ok since i just finished the quiz now im trying to play the game. What should i do to start playing this game? everytime i put in like the right port everyone is puttin in it doens't work either the ip eveyrone else is in even when i try ot do my own server it says server is down all the time. This game which i really wanan play is totally not working lol and i reallly wanan play HELP ANYONE wat shoul di do first?

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @warmwaddle warmwaddle
item.description:
@warmwaddle wrote:

A majority of all servers are hamachi… If you have downloaded hamachi, I have a server that is up 24/7
(nobody on atm)
warmwaddle6
password: 123
Port: 43594 (its default so dont change it when you bring up moparscape)
I.P. = warmwaddle.servegame.com
Now I think someone posted hamachi in the download section…I’m not sure where it is. But when you download it, install it, and at the bottem of the hamachi window there are three buttons. Click the middle one, and a list will pop up. Select the one that says “join an existing network” and put warmwaddle6 in the title spot, and 123 in the password spot. Click ok, then get on moparscape (use the webclient, at www.moparisthebest.com) And use any username and password in the correct spots, then type warmwaddle.servegame.com in the spot marked IP:. Hope this helped!!

Read full topic
